metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3496 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A heap-based buffer overflow was found in jhead in version 3.06 in Get16u() in exif.c when processing a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3496` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.04-1ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jhead package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.04-1ubuntu0.2+esm1').
